Label: Point
Description: A 0-dimensional geometric object representing a single location in coordinate space with x and y coordinates, and optionally z and m coordinates.

Label: Class
Description: The class of classes, used in RDF Schema to define the concept of a class.

Label: Block Group
Description: A census block group, a geographic subdivision used for statistical purposes.

Label: Census Tract
Description: A census tract, a small geographic subdivision used for presenting statistical data.

Label: Incident
Description: An event or occurrence, typically related to public safety or emergency services.

Label: Location
Description: A geographic location or place within the Philadelphia region.

Label: asWKT
Description: A datatype property that serializes a geometry object as Well-Known Text (WKT) literal format.

Label: hasGeometry
Description: An object property that links a spatial feature to its geometric representation.

Label: age_of
Description: Indicates the age of a person involved in an incident.

Label: happened_at
Description: Links an incident to the location where it occurred.

Label: is_fatal
Description: Boolean property indicating whether an incident resulted in a fatality.

Label: OffenderDeceased
Description: Indicates whether an offender was deceased in relation to an incident.

Label: OffenderInjured
Description: Indicates whether an offender was injured in relation to an incident.

Label: OffenderRace
Description: Specifies the race of an offender involved in an incident.

Label: OffenderSex
Description: Specifies the sex or gender of an offender involved in an incident.

Label: OfficerInvolved
Description: Indicates whether a law enforcement officer was involved in an incident.
